entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure: 98.5 kPa
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: NNW 34 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 this morning then diminishing to 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
